pages.text: The Totem of Amethyst is a powerful artifact reminiscent of the totems crafted by illagers. Totems have a soul of their own, and are therefor more potent magical vessels than jewelry. $(l)Totems can have one passive $(o)and$() $(l)one active augment at any given time.$(br2)If you wish to change augments, you may strip your totem of its current abilities in a $($490)Grindstone$(), or you can retain a copy of a previous augment from a $($490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/disenchanting_table)Disenchanting Table$()
